reviewText:
I have been looking for this darn thing for AGES. I am disappointed that it is only to be found in VHS.  I am VERY happy to have it none the less.
I have watched this many times and will watch again many more.
The story unfolds with great writing and actors, delving into humor and sadness with unexpected surprises.
Life has many twists and mysteries, famously, it doesn't necessarily turn out the way you would like.
 I love the music and would like to know more information on the performers. Hard to read those VHS credits. There is not a lot of info out there on this movie. Beautiful backdrop for plot.
 EXCELLENT  ATTENTIVE  KNOWLEDGEABLE SELLER.  A VAST PORTAL OF INFORMATION  FAST SHIPPING
Looked for this for a long time. Good movie from Canada.
